translated: Those who will reappear in a future existence in the immaterial world, for them the eye faculty has arisen and the mental-data faculty will arise. For the rest, the eye faculty has arisen and the mental-data faculty will arise.🔽As to one whose … has arisen: the past. (Eye-base.)

original: Yassa ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjittha tassa rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa ghāna āyatanam uppajjittha tassa rūpa āyatanam uppajjissati iti
translated: As to “For one whose nose faculty has arisen, will his visible-data faculty arise? “

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ ye ca arūpaṁ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ ghānāyatanaṁ🔽uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ ghānāyatanañca
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam ye ca arūpam upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesam ghāna āyatana  uppajjittha no ca tesam rūpa āyatanam uppajjissati itaresam tesam ghāna āyatanañca
translated: For those who will be reborn in the future, and for those who will attain Nibbāna without exertion, the nose-faculty🔽has arisen, but the visible-form faculty will not arise. For the rest, the nose-faculty🔽has arisen,

original: uppajjittha rūpāyatanañca uppajjissati.🔽Yassa vā pana …pe… uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: uppajjittha rūpa āyatanañca uppajjissati  yassa vā pana pe uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: Those who will arise in the formless Brahma-world and attain final Nibbāna there, for them the nose-sphere has arisen and will not arise. For the rest, the nose-sphere has arisen and the form-sphere will arise.

original: Yassa ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjittha tassa manāyatanaṁ …pe… dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa ghāna āyatanam uppajjittha tassa manāyatanam pe dhammāyatanam uppajjissati iti
translated: “Or, those in whom the nose-sphere has arisen, in them the mind-sphere … the mind-object-sphere has arisen?”

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ ghānāyatanañca uppajjittha dhammāyatanañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam tesam ghāna āyatanam uppajjittha no ca tesam dhamma āyatanam uppajjissati itaresam tesam ghāna āyatanam ca uppajjittha dhamma āyatanam ca uppajjissati
translated: Those who are in the process of arising in the next existence, for them the nose-sphere has arisen and the mind-object-sphere will arise.

original: Yassa vā pana dhammāyatanaṁ …pe… uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yassa vā pana dhamma āyatanam pe uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: “Or, those in whom the mind-object-sphere has arisen …?”

original: Yassa rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjittha tassa manāyatanaṁ …pe… dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa rūpa āyatanam uppajjittha tassa manāyatanam pe dhamma āyatanam uppajjissati iti
translated: Those in whom the form-sphere has arisen, in them the mind-sphere … the mind-object-sphere has arisen.🔽“Or, those in whom the mind-object-sphere has arisen, in them the form-sphere has arisen?”

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ rūpāyatanañca uppajjittha dhammāyatanañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam tesam rūpa āyatanam uppajjittha no ca tesam dhamma āyatanam uppajjissati itaresam tesam rūpa āyatanam ca uppajjittha dhamma āyatanam ca uppajjissati
translated: For those about to reappear in a lower world, their visible-form element has arisen, but their mental-data element will not arise. For the rest, their visible-form element has arisen and their mental-data element will arise.

original: Yassa vā pana …pe… uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yassa vā pana pe uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: As to “in one who … arises”: the past is referred to.

original: Yassa manāyatanaṁ uppajjittha tassa dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa manāyatanam uppajjittha tassa dhammāyatanam uppajjissati iti
translated: “In one in whom the mind element arises, will the mental-data element arise?”

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ manāyatanaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ manāyatanañca uppajjittha dhammāyatanañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam tesam manāyatanam uppajjittha no ca tesam dhammāyatanam uppajjissati itaresam tesam manāyatanam ca uppajjittha dhammāyatanam ca uppajjissati
translated: For those about to reappear in a lower world, their mind element has arisen, but their mental-data element will not arise. For the rest, their mind element has arisen and their mental-data element will arise.

original: Yassa vā pana dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati tassa manāyatanaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yassa vā pana dhamma āyatanam uppajjissati tassa manāyatanam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: As to “in one who … will arise”: the future is referred to.

original: Yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjittha tassa tattha sotāyatanaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa yattha cakkhāyatanam uppajjittha tassa tattha sotāyatanam uppajjissati iti
translated: “In one in whom the eye element has arisen, will the ear element arise?”

analyzed: pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha cakkhu āyatanam uppajjittha no ca tesam
translated: In the case of those of the five-constituent kind, the eye-base arises there, but not the ear-base.

Of the rest of those in the five-constituent becoming, their eye-sensitivity has arisen there and their ear-sensitivity will arise there.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha sotāyatanaṁ uppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.

translated: Or, of those whose ear-sensitivity will arise there, has their eye-sensitivity arisen there?

original: Yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjittha tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa yattha cakkhāyatanam uppajjittha tassa tattha ghāna āyatanam uppajjissati iti
translated: Of those whose eye-sensitivity has arisen there, will their nose-sensitivity arise there?

original: Kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṁ rūpāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjittha,🔽no ca tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
analyzed: kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānam rūpāvacarānam tesam tattha cakkhu āyatanam uppajjittha  no ca tesam tattha ghāna āyatanam uppajjissati itaresam kāmāvacarānam tesam tattha
translated: Of those reappearing in the sensual-desire becoming and in the fine-material becoming, their eye-sensitivity has arisen there,

original: cakkhāyatanañca uppajjittha ghānāyatanañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: cakkhu āyatanañca uppajjittha ghāna āyatanañca uppajjissati
translated: but their nose-sensitivity will not arise there. Of the rest of those in the sensual-desire becoming, their eye-sensitivity has arisen there and their nose-sensitivity will arise there.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha …pe… uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha pe uppajjittha ati āmantā

original: Yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjittha tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjissatīti?🔽Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ🔽tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha cakkhāyatanañca

original: Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjitthāti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha rūpa āyatanam uppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhu āyatanam uppajjittha ati
translated: Or if the visible-data sensitivity of a certain person will arise, has his eye-sensitivity arisen?

analyzed: asaññasattānam tesam tattha rūpa āyatanam uppajjissati no ca tesam tattha cakkhu āyatana
translated: In the case of those in the non-percipient becoming, their visible-data sensitivity will arise but not their eye-sensitivity.

translated: In the case of those in the five-constituent becoming their visible-data sensitivity will arise and their eye-sensitivity has arisen.

analyzed: pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha cakkhu āyatanam uppajjittha no ca tesam

analyzed: tattha manāyatanam uppajjissati itaresam pañcavokārānam tesam tattha cakkhāyatanañca

translated: In the case of those of the five-constituent kind who are due to reappear in a plane of existence without form, the mind faculty will arise in them and the eye faculty has arisen.🔽In the case of those of the five-constituent kind who are due to reappear in a plane of existence without form, the mind faculty will arise in them but the eye faculty has not arisen.

original: Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ
analyzed: pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha cakkhu āyatanam uppajjittha no ca tesam
translated: In the case of those of the five-constituent kind who are due to reappear in a plane of existence with form, the mind faculty

analyzed: tattha dhamma āyatanam uppajjissati itaresam pañcavokārānam tesam tattha cakkhu āyatanañca
translated: there will be the mind-base. As for the rest of the five-constituent beings, there will be the eye-base there,

original: uppajjittha dhammāyatanañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: uppajjittha dhamma āyatanañca uppajjissati
translated: and there will be the mind-base there.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjitthāti?🔽Asaññasattānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha

translated: But if there will be the mind-base there, will there also be the eye-base there?

analyzed: cakkhu āyatanam uppajjittha pañcavokārānam tesam tattha dhamma āyatanañca uppajjissati
translated: In the case of the non-percipient beings and of those in the immaterial (realms), there will be the mind-base there, but there will not be the eye-base there. As for the rest of the five-constituent beings, there will be the mind-base there,

original: cakkhāyatanañca uppajjittha. (Cakkhāyatanamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: cakkhu āyatanam ca uppajjittha cakkhu āyatana mūlaka
translated: and there will be the eye-base there. (The section on the eye-base.)

original: Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjittha tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjissatīti?🔽Kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ
analyzed: yassa yattha ghāna āyatanam uppajjittha tassa tattha rūpa āyatanam uppajjissati iti  kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha ghāna āyatanam uppajjittha no ca tesam
translated: If there is the nose-base there, will there also be the form-base there?

original: tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanañca
analyzed: tattha rūpa āyatanam uppajjissati itaresam kāmāvacarānam tesam tattha ghāna āyatanañca
translated: In the case of those in the last (formless) existence of the sense-sphere, there is the nose-base there, but there will not be the form-base there. As for the rest of the sense-sphere (beings), there is the nose-base there,🔽and there will be the form-base there.

original: uppajjittha rūpāyatanañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: uppajjittha rūpa āyatanañca uppajjissati
translated: and the visible-form element will arise.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjissati tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjitthāti?🔽Rūpāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjittha. Kāmāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanañca uppajjissati ghānāyatanañca uppajjittha.
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha rūpa āyatanam uppajjissati tassa tattha ghāna āyatanam uppajjittha ati  rūpāvacarānam tesam tattha rūpa āyatanam uppajjissati no ca tesam tattha ghāna āyatanam uppajjittha kāmāvacarānam tesam tattha rūpa āyatanam ca uppajjissati ghāna āyatanam ca uppajjittha
translated: Or, when the nose-consciousness element arises in a certain being, will the visible-form element arise in that being?🔽In the case of those in the fine-material sphere, the visible-form element will arise in them, but not the nose-consciousness element. In the case of those in the sense sphere, the visible-form element and the nose-consciousness element will arise.

original: Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjittha tassa tattha manāyatanaṁ …pe… dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa yattha ghāna āyatanam uppajjittha tassa tattha manāyatanam pe dhammāyatanam uppajjissati iti
translated: When the nose-consciousness element arises in a certain being, will the mind element arise in that being? … Will the mind-consciousness element arise? … Will the visible-form element arise? … Will the sound element arise? … Will the odour element arise? … Will the taste element arise? … Will the body-consciousness element arise? … Will the mind element arise? … Will the mind-consciousness element arise? … Will the phenomena element arise in that being?

original: Kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ🔽tattha dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanañca
analyzed: kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha ghāna āyatanam uppajjittha no ca tesam  tattha dhammāyatanam uppajjissati itaresam kāmāvacarānam tesam tattha ghāna āyatanañca
translated: In the case of those in the last life in the sense sphere, the nose-consciousness element will arise in them, but not the phenomena element.

original: uppajjittha dhammāyatanañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: uppajjittha dhamma āyatanañca uppajjissati
translated: In the case of the rest in the sense sphere, the nose-consciousness element and the phenomena element will arise.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjitthāti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanam uppajjissati tassa tattha ghāna āyatanam uppajjittha ati
translated: Or, where the idea-base will arise, will the nose-base have arisen there?

original: Rūpāvacarānaṁ arūpāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ
analyzed: rūpāvacarānam arūpāvacarānam tesam tattha dhammāyatanam uppajjissati no ca tesam
translated: In the case of those in the fine-material and immaterial realms, the idea-base will arise there, but the nose-base will not have arisen there.

original: tattha ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjittha. Kāmāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanañca uppajjissati
analyzed: tattha ghāna āyatanam uppajjittha kāmāvacarānam tesam tattha dhammāyatanañca uppajjissati
translated: In the case of those in the sensual realm, the idea-base will arise there and the nose-base will have arisen there.

original: ghānāyatanañca uppajjittha. (Ghānāyatanamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: ghāna āyatanam ca uppajjittha ghāna āyatana mūlaka
translated: (The nose-base is the subject of this section.

original: Yassa yattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjittha tassa tattha manāyatanaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa yattha rūpa āyatanam uppajjittha tassa tattha manāyatanam uppajjissati iti
translated: ) Where the visible-form base has arisen, will the mind base arise there?

original: Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjittha,
analyzed: pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānam asaññasattānam tesam tattha rūpa āyatanam uppajjittha
translated: In the case of those in the five-constituent becoming and in the non-percipient beings, the visible-form base has arisen there,

original: no ca tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
analyzed: no ca tesam tattha mana āyatanam uppajjissati itaresam pañcavokārānam tesam tattha
translated: but the mind base will not arise there. In the case of those in the five-constituent becoming,

original: rūpāyatanañca uppajjittha manāyatanañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: rūpa āyatanañca uppajjittha manāyatanañca uppajjissati
translated: the visible-form base has arisen there and the mind base will arise there.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanaṁ uppajjissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjitthāti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanam uppajjissati tassa tattha rūpa āyatanam uppajjittha ati
translated: Or, where the mind base will arise, has the visible-form base arisen there?

original: Arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjittha. Pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanañca uppajjissati rūpāyatanañca uppajjittha.
analyzed: arūpānam tesam tattha manāyatanam uppajjissati no ca tesam tattha rūpāyatanam uppajjittha pañcavokārānam tesam tattha manāyatanam ca uppajjissati rūpāyatanam ca uppajjittha
translated: for those of the formless realm, the mind base will arise there, but the form base will not arise there. For those of the five-constituent kind, both the mind base and the form base will arise there.

original: Yassa yattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjittha tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissatīti?🔽Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ🔽tattha dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
analyzed: yassa yattha rūpa āyatanam uppajjittha tassa tattha dhamma āyatanam uppajjissati iti  pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha rūpa āyatanam uppajjittha no ca tesam  tattha dhammāyatanam uppajjissati itaresam pañcavokārānam asaññasattānam tesam tattha
translated: If the form base arises in a given person, will the mental data base arise in him?🔽For those of the five-constituent kind in their last existence, the form base will arise in them, but the mental data base will not arise in them.

original: rūpāyatanañca uppajjittha dhammāyatanañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: rūpa āyatanañca uppajjittha dhamma āyatanañca uppajjissati
translated: For the rest of those of the five-constituent kind and for the non-percipient beings, the form base will arise in them and the mental data base will arise in them.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uppajjitthāti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha dhamma āyatanam uppajjissati tassa tattha rūpa āyatanam uppajjittha ati
translated: If the mental data base will arise in a given person, will the form base arise in him?

original: Arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ
analyzed: arūpānam tesam tattha dhamma āyatanam uppajjissati no ca tesam tattha rūpa āyatana
translated: For those of the formless realm, the mental data base will arise in them, but the form base will not arise in them.

original: uppajjittha. Pañcavokārānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanañca uppajjissati
analyzed: uppajjittha pañcavokārānam asaññasattānam tesam tattha dhammāyatanañca uppajjissati
translated: in the five-constituent beings who are without thought, there is the arising of the sense-sphere of mental objects

original: rūpāyatanañca uppajjittha. (Rūpāyatanamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: rūpa āyatanam ca uppajjittha rūpa āyatana mūlaka
translated: and the arising of the sense-sphere of visible form. (The sense-sphere of visible form is finished.)

original: Yassa yattha manāyatanaṁ uppajjittha tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissatīti?🔽Pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ
analyzed: yassa yattha manāyatanam uppajjittha tassa tattha dhammāyatanam uppajjissati iti  pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha manāyatanam uppajjittha no ca tesam tattha dhammāyatana
translated: If there is the arising of the sense-sphere of the mind in any place, will there be the arising of the sense-sphere of mental objects there?🔽For those in their last existence, there is the arising of the sense-sphere of the mind there, but there is not the arising of the sense-sphere of mental objects there.

original: uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ catuvokārānaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanañca uppajjittha
analyzed: uppajjissati itaresam catuvokārānam pañcavokārānam tesam tattha mana āyatanam ca uppajjittha
translated: For those in the four-constituent and five-constituent (types of rebirth), there is the arising of the sense-sphere of the mind there

original: dhammāyatanañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: dhammāyatanañca uppajjissati
translated: and there is the arising of the sense-sphere of mental objects there.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati tassa tattha manāyatanaṁ uppajjitthāti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha dhamma āyatanam uppajjissati tassa tattha manāyatanam uppajjittha ati
translated: Or, if there is the arising of the sense-sphere of mental objects in any place, will there be the arising of the sense-sphere of the mind there?

original: Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ
analyzed: asaññasattānam tesam tattha dhammāyatanam uppajjissati no ca tesam tattha manāyatana
translated: For the beings without thought, there is the arising of the sense-sphere of mental objects there, but there is not the arising of the sense-sphere of the mind there.

original: uppajjittha. Catuvokārānaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanañca uppajjissati
analyzed: uppajjittha catuvokārānam pañcavokārānam tesam tattha dhamma āyatanañca uppajjissati
translated: For those in the four-constituent and five-constituent (types of rebirth), there is the arising of the sense-sphere of mental objects there🔽and there is the arising of the sense-sphere of the mind there.

original: manāyatanañca uppajjittha. (Manāyatanamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: manāyatanam ca uppajjittha manāyatana mūlaka
translated: and the mind-base arises. (The mind-base.)

original: 3.2.1.6.4. Paccanīkapuggala🔽Yassa cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa sotāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti? Natthi.
analyzed: paccanīka puggala  yassa cakkhāyatanam nuppajjittha tassa sotāyatanam nuppajjissati iti natthi
translated: The opposite type of person🔽“If the eye-base has not arisen, does the ear-base not have to arise?” There is none.

original: Yassa vā pana sotāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
analyzed: yassa vā pana sota āyatanam nuppajjissati tassa cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha ati uppajjittha
translated: “If the ear-base is not to arise, has the eye-base arisen?” It has arisen.

original: Yassa cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa ghānāyatanaṁ …pe… rūpāyatanaṁ … manāyatanaṁ … dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti? Natthi.
analyzed: yassa cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha tassa ghāna āyatanam pe rūpa āyatanam manāyatanam dhamma āyatanam nuppajjissati iti natthi
translated: “If the eye-base has not arisen, does the nose-base … the visible-form base … the mind-base … the mental-data base not have to arise?” There is none.

original: Yassa vā pana dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.🔽Yassa ghānāyatanaṁ …pe… rūpāyatanaṁ … manāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti? Natthi.
analyzed: yassa vā pana dhamma āyatanam nuppajjissati tassa cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha ati uppajjittha  yassa ghāna āyatanam pe rūpa āyatanam manāyatanam nuppajjittha tassa dhammāyatanam nuppajjissati iti natthi
translated: “If the mental-data base is not to arise, has the eye-base arisen?” It has arisen.🔽“If the nose-base … the visible-form base … the mind-base has not arisen, does the mental-data base not have to arise?” There is none.

original: Yassa vā pana dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa manāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
analyzed: yassa vā pana dhamma āyatanam nuppajjissati tassa manāyatanam nuppajjittha ati uppajjittha
translated: “If the mental-data base is not to arise, has the mind-base arisen?” It has arisen.

original: 3.2.1.6.5. Paccanīkaokāsa
analyzed: paccanīka okāsa
translated: The opposite type of opportunity

original: Yattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha …pe….
analyzed: yattha cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha pe
translated: where the eye faculty does not arise …

original: 3.2.1.6.6. Paccanīkapuggalokāsa
analyzed: paccanīka puggala okāsa
translated: … the opposite kind of person and place

original: Yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha sotāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yassa yattha cakkhāyatanam nuppajjittha tassa tattha sotāyatanam nuppajjissati iti āmantā
translated: As to those in whom the eye faculty does not arise, does the ear faculty not arise in them too? Yes.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha sotāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti?🔽Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha sotāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ🔽tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha. Suddhāvāsānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha sota āyatanam nuppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha ati  pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha sotāyatanam nuppajjissati no ca tesam  tattha cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha suddhāvāsānam asaññasattānam arūpānam tesam tattha
translated: Or, as to those in whom the ear faculty will not arise, does the eye faculty not arise in them?🔽In the five-constituent becoming, in the last stage of life, the ear faculty will not arise in them, but the eye faculty does not not arise in them.

original: sotāyatanañca nuppajjissati cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjittha.🔽Yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: sota āyatanam ca nuppajjissati cakkhu āyatanam ca nuppajjittha  yassa yattha cakkhāyatanam nuppajjittha tassa tattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjissati iti āmantā
translated: In the Pure Abodes and among the non-percipient beings and the immaterial beings, the ear faculty will not arise and the eye faculty does not arise.🔽As to those in whom the eye faculty does not arise, does the nose faculty not arise in them too? Yes.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha ati
translated: Or, as to those in whom the nose faculty will not arise, does the eye faculty not arise in them?

original: Kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṁ rūpāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati,🔽no ca tesaṁ tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha. Suddhāvāsānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ arūpānaṁ
analyzed: kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānam rūpāvacarānam tesam tattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjissati  no ca tesam tattha cakkha āyatanam nuppajjittha suddhāvāsānam asaññasattānam arūpānam
translated: Those in the sensuous worlds who are bound for the form worlds, and those in the Pure Abodes and the non-percipient beings and the immaterial beings,🔽have not yet arisen in them.

original: tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjissati cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjittha.🔽Yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti?🔽Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ
analyzed: tesam tattha ghāna āyatanam ca nuppajjissati cakkhu āyatanam ca nuppajjittha  yassa yattha cakkhāyatanam nuppajjittha tassa tattha rūpāyatanam nuppajjissati iti  asaññasattānam tesam tattha cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha no ca tesam tattha rūpa āyatana
translated: As to those in whom the eye faculty has not yet arisen, the form faculty will not arise in them.🔽As to those in whom the eye faculty has not yet arisen, the form faculty will not arise in them.🔽As to those in whom the form faculty will not arise, the eye faculty has not yet arisen in them.

original: nuppajjissati. Suddhāvāsānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjittha rūpāyatanañca nuppajjissati.🔽Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti?🔽Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ
analyzed: nuppajjissati suddhāvāsānam arūpānam tesam tattha cakkhu āyatanam ca nuppajjittha rūpa āyatanam ca nuppajjissati 🔽yassa vā pana yattha rūpa āyatanam nuppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha ati 🔽pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha rūpa āyatanam nuppajjissati no ca tesam
translated: As to those in whom the form faculty will not arise, the eye faculty has not yet arisen in them.

original: tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha. Suddhāvāsānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanañca
analyzed: tattha cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha suddhāvāsānam arūpānam tesam tattha rūpa āyatanam ca
translated: Herein, the eye-base does not arise in the Pure Abodes of the Formless world.

original: nuppajjissati cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjittha.
analyzed: nuppajjissati cakkhu āyatanañca nuppajjittha
translated: The visible-form base and the eye-base do not arise in the Pure Abodes of the Formless world.

original: Yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti?🔽Arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ🔽nuppajjissati. Suddhāvāsānaṁ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
analyzed: yassa yattha cakkhāyatanam nuppajjittha tassa tattha manāyatanam nuppajjissati iti  arūpānam tesam tattha cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha no ca tesam tattha manāyatana  nuppajjissati suddhāvāsānam arūpe pacchimabhavikānam asaññasattānam tesam tattha
translated: If anyone’s eye-base does not arise in any given place, will his mind-base arise there?🔽The eye-base does not arise in the Formless world, but his mind-base does arise there.

original: cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjittha manāyatanañca nuppajjissati.
analyzed: cakkhu āyatanañca nuppajjittha manāyatanañca nuppajjissati
translated: The eye-base and the mind-base do not arise in the Pure Abodes of the Formless world, in the last stage of becoming, and in the Non-percipient World.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti?🔽Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha mana āyatanam nuppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha ati  pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha manāyatanam nuppajjissati no ca tesam
translated: If anyone’s mind-base will arise in any given place, will his eye-base arise there?🔽The mind-base will arise in the five-constituent becoming, but his eye-base does not arise there.

original: tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha. Suddhāvāsānaṁ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ
analyzed: tattha cakkha āyatanam nuppajjittha suddhāvāsānam arūpe pacchimabhavikānam asaññasattānam
translated: The mind-base will arise in the Pure Abodes of the Formless world, in the last stage of becoming, and in the Non-percipient World, but his eye-base does not arise there.

original: tesaṁ tattha manāyatanañca nuppajjissati cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjittha.
analyzed: tesam tattha manāyatanam ca nuppajjissati cakkhāyatanam ca nuppajjittha
translated: for them there is no future arising of the mind base and there is no past arising of the eye base.

original: Yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti?🔽Asaññasattānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha🔽dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati. Suddhāvāsānaṁ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
analyzed: yassa yattha cakkhāyatanam nuppajjittha tassa tattha dhammāyatanam nuppajjissati iti  asaññasattānam arūpānam tesam tattha cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha no ca tesam tattha  dhammāyatanam nuppajjissati suddhāvāsānam arūpe pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha
translated: If anyone’s eye base does not arise in a certain place, does his mental data base not arise there too?🔽In the case of those without perceptions, and of those in the immaterial (realms), their eye base does not arise there, but their mental data base

original: cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjittha dhammāyatanañca nuppajjissati.
analyzed: cakkhu āyatanam ca nuppajjittha dhamma āyatanam ca nuppajjissati
translated: does arise there. In the case of those in the Pure Abodes, and of those in their last existence, their eye base does not arise there, and their mental data base will not arise there either.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti?🔽Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha dhamma āyatanam nuppajjissati tassa tattha cakkhu āyatanam nuppajjittha ati  pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha dhammāyatanam nuppajjissati no ca tesam
translated: But if anyone’s mental data base will not arise in a certain place, does his eye base not arise there too?

original: tattha cakkhāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha. Suddhāvāsānaṁ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
analyzed: tattha cakkha āyatanam nuppajjittha suddhāvāsānam arūpe pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha
translated: In the case of those in their last existence in the five-fold group, their mental data base will not arise there, but their eye base does not not arise there. In the case of those in the Pure Abodes, and of those in their last existence in the immaterial (realms), their mental data base will not arise there, and their eye base does not arise there.

original: dhammāyatanañca nuppajjissati cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjittha. (Cakkhāyatanamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma āyatanam ca nuppajjissati cakkhu āyatanam ca nuppajjittha cakkhu āyatana mūlaka
translated: and the mental-data base will not arise, the eye base has arisen.

original: Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti?🔽Rūpāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ
analyzed: yassa yattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjittha tassa tattha rūpa āyatanam nuppajjissati iti  rūpa avacarānam tesam tattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjittha no ca tesam tattha rūpa āyatana
translated: When someone’s nose base has not arisen, his form base will not arise.🔽In the case of those in the form realm, his nose base has not arisen, but his form base has not ceased.

original: nuppajjissati. Rūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanañca
analyzed: nuppajjissati rūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānam arūpānam tesam tattha ghāna āyatanañca
translated: In the case of those in the form realm in their last existence, and of those not taking rebirth, his nose base has not arisen, and his form base will not arise.

original: nuppajjittha rūpāyatanañca nuppajjissati.🔽Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti?🔽Kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ🔽tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha. Rūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
analyzed: nuppajjittha rūpa āyatanam ca nuppajjissati  yassa vā pana yattha rūpa āyatanam nuppajjissati tassa tattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjittha ati  kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha rūpa āyatanam nuppajjissati no ca tesam  tattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjittha rūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānam arūpānam tesam tattha
translated: When someone’s form base will not arise, his nose base has not arisen.🔽In the case of those in the sensual realm in their last existence, his form base will not arise, but his nose base has not ceased.

original: rūpāyatanañca nuppajjissati ghānāyatanañca nuppajjittha.
analyzed: rūpa āyatanam ca nuppajjissati ghāna āyatanam ca nuppajjittha
translated: In the case of those in the form realm in their last existence, and of those not taking rebirth, his form base will not arise, and his nose base has not arisen.

original: Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti?🔽Rūpāvacarānaṁ arūpāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ🔽tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati. Rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ
analyzed: yassa yattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjittha tassa tattha mana āyatanam nuppajjissati iti  rūpāvacarānam arūpāvacarānam tesam tattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjittha no ca tesam  tattha manāyatanam nuppajjissati rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānam asaññasattānam
translated: “When the nose faculty has arisen in a certain person, has the mind faculty also arisen in him?”🔽In those in the fine-material sphere and in those in the immaterial sphere, the nose faculty has arisen, but not the mind faculty.

original: tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjittha manāyatanañca nuppajjissati.
analyzed: tesam tattha ghāna āyatanam ca nuppajjittha manāyatanam ca nuppajjissati
translated: In those in the fine-material and immaterial realms in their last existence, and in non-percipient beings, the nose faculty has not arisen, and the mind faculty has not arisen.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti?🔽Kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ🔽tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha. Rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanam nuppajjissati tassa tattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjittha ati  kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha mana āyatanam nuppajjissati no ca tesam  tattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjittha rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānam asaññasattānam
translated: “When the mind faculty has arisen in a certain person, has the nose faculty also arisen in him?”🔽In those in the sensual realm in their last existence, the mind faculty has arisen, but not the nose faculty.

original: tesaṁ tattha manāyatanañca nuppajjissati ghānāyatanañca nuppajjittha.
analyzed: tesam tattha manāyatanam ca nuppajjissati ghāna āyatanam ca nuppajjittha
translated: In those in the fine-material and immaterial realms in their last existence, and in non-percipient beings, the mind faculty has not arisen, and the nose faculty has not arisen.

original: Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti?🔽Rūpāvacarānaṁ arūpāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ🔽tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati. Rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ
analyzed: yassa yattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjittha tassa tattha dhammāyatanam nuppajjissati iti  rūpāvacarānam arūpāvacarānam tesam tattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjittha no ca tesam  tattha dhamma āyatanam nuppajjissati rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānam
translated: If the nose-sphere does not arise in any given person, in that person the mind-object-sphere will not arise.🔽In those in the fine-material sphere and in those in the immaterial sphere, the nose-sphere does not arise, but not so the mind-object-sphere.

original: tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjittha dhammāyatanañca nuppajjissati.
analyzed: tattha ghāna āyatanañca nuppajjittha dhamma āyatanañca nuppajjissati
translated: In those in the fine-material and immaterial spheres in their last existence, the nose-sphere does not arise, and the mind-object-sphere will not arise.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti?🔽Kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ🔽tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha. Rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha dhamma āyatanam nuppajjissati tassa tattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjittha ati  kāmāvacare pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha dhamma āyatanam nuppajjissati no ca tesam  tattha ghāna āyatanam nuppajjittha rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānam
translated: But if the mind-object-sphere will not arise in any given person, in that person the nose-sphere does not arise.

original: tattha dhammāyatanañca nuppajjissati ghānāyatanañca nuppajjittha. (Ghānāyatanamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: tattha dhamma āyatanam ca nuppajjissati ghāna āyatanam ca nuppajjittha ghāna āyatana mūlaka
translated: In those in the fine-material and immaterial spheres in their last existence, the mind-object-sphere will not arise, and the nose-sphere does not arise.

original: Yassa yattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti?🔽Arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati.
analyzed: yassa yattha rūpa āyatanam nuppajjittha tassa tattha manāyatanam nuppajjissati iti  arūpānam tesam tattha rūpa āyatanam nuppajjittha no ca tesam tattha manāyatanam nuppajjissati
translated: “When anyone’s eye faculty has not yet arisen, has his mental faculty not yet to arise?🔽Those in the immaterial realms have their eye faculty not yet to arise, but their mental faculty is not not yet to arise.

original: Suddhāvāsānaṁ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanañca nuppajjittha manāyatanañca nuppajjissati.
analyzed: suddhāvāsānam arūpe pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha rūpa āyatanam ca nuppajjittha manāyatanam ca nuppajjissati
translated: Those in the Suddhāvāsas and those in their last existence in the immaterial realms have both their eye faculty and their mental faculty not yet to arise.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanam nuppajjissati tassa tattha rūpa āyatanam nuppajjittha ati
translated: “When anyone’s mental faculty has not yet to arise, has his eye faculty not yet to arise?

original: Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati,
analyzed: pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānam asaññasattānam tesam tattha manāyatanam nuppajjissati
translated: Those in the five-constituent becoming and those in their last existence in the non-percipient realm have their mental faculty not yet to arise,

original: no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha. Suddhāvāsānaṁ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṁ
analyzed: no ca tesam tattha rūpa āyatanam nuppajjittha suddhāvāsānam arūpe
translated: but their eye faculty is not not yet to arise. Those in the Suddhāvāsas and those in their last existence in the immaterial realms

original: tesaṁ tattha manāyatanañca nuppajjissati rūpāyatanañca nuppajjittha.
analyzed: tesam tattha manāyatanam ca nuppajjissati rūpāyatanam ca nuppajjittha
translated: have both their mental faculty and their eye faculty not yet to arise.

original: Yassa yattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa yattha rūpa āyatanam nuppajjittha tassa tattha dhamma āyatanam nuppajjissati iti
translated: “When anyone’s eye faculty has not yet arisen, has his mental-data faculty not yet to arise?

original: Arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ
analyzed: arūpānam tesam tattha rūpa āyatanam nuppajjittha no ca tesam tattha dhamma āyatana
translated: In the case of those non-percipient beings, the eye-base does not arise there, but the mental-data base will arise there.

original: nuppajjissati. Suddhāvāsānaṁ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanañca🔽nuppajjittha dhammāyatanañca nuppajjissati.
analyzed: nuppajjissati suddhāvāsānam arūpe pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha rūpa āyatanañca  nuppajjittha dhamma āyatanam ca nuppajjissati
translated: In the case of those in the Pure Abodes in the immaterial world, the eye-base does not arise there, and the mental-data base will not arise there.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti?🔽Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha dhamma āyatanam nuppajjissati tassa tattha rūpa āyatanam nuppajjittha ati  pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha dhammāyatanam nuppajjissati no ca tesam
translated: Or, in the case of those in whom the mental-data base will not arise, the eye-base does not arise there.🔽In the case of those in the five-constituent becoming in their last existence, the mental-data base will not arise there, but the eye-base does not arise there.

original: tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha. Suddhāvāsānaṁ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
analyzed: tattha rūpa āyatanam nuppajjittha suddhāvāsānam arūpe pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha
translated: In the case of those in the Pure Abodes in the immaterial world in their last existence, the mental-data base will not arise there, and the eye-base does not arise there.

original: dhammāyatanañca nuppajjissati rūpāyatanañca nuppajjittha. (Rūpāyatanamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma āyatanam ca nuppajjissati rūpa āyatanam ca nuppajjittha rūpa āyatana mūlaka
translated: In the case of those in whom the eye-base does not arise, the mental-data base will not arise there.

original: Yassa yattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa yattha manāyatanam nuppajjittha tassa tattha dhammāyatanam nuppajjissati iti
translated: In the case of those in whom the mind-base does not arise, the mental-data base will not arise there.

original: Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ
analyzed: asaññasattānam tesam tattha manāyatanam nuppajjittha no ca tesam tattha dhammāyatana
translated: Those in the immaterial sphere who die and are reborn in the immaterial sphere: the mind base does not arise for them there, but the mental-data base …

original: nuppajjissati. Suddhāvāsānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanañca nuppajjittha dhammāyatanañca nuppajjissati.🔽Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti?🔽Pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ
analyzed: nuppajjissati suddhāvāsānam tesam tattha manāyatanam ca nuppajjittha dhammāyatanam ca nuppajjissati  yassa vā pana yattha dhamma āyatanam nuppajjissati tassa tattha manāyatanam nuppajjittha ati  pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha dhamma āyatanam nuppajjissati no ca tesam tattha manāyatana
translated: The mind base and the mental-data base do not arise for those in the Pure Abodes who die and are reborn in the Pure Abodes.🔽Or those in the mental-data realm who die and are reborn in the mental-data realm: the mental-data base does not arise for them there, but the mind base …

original: nuppajjittha. Suddhāvāsānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanañca nuppajjissati manāyatanañca nuppajjittha.
analyzed: nuppajjittha suddhāvāsānam tesam tattha dhammāyatanam ca nuppajjissati manāyatanam ca nuppajjittha
translated: The mental-data base and the mind base do not arise for those in the Pure Abodes who die and are reborn in the Pure Abodes.

original: Uppādavāro.
analyzed: uppāda vāraḥ
translated: The section on arising.
